charinfo.name: Dodai (S)
charinfo.description: Dodai (S) is a skilled sensor shinobi and a lava release user as well. His intelligence is his most powerful asset and he will need it to survive this war.

abilities.name: Rubber Wall
abilities.description: Dodai (S) uses Rubber Wall on all allies. Damage dealt to Dodai (S) and his team will be reduced by 20% for 3 turns. All targets of this skill will ignore stun effects during this skill.

abilities.name: Communication Telepathy
abilities.description: Using Communication Telepathy Dodai (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy will be unable to use stun effects(This is a stun effect).

abilities.name: Rubber Ball and Rope
abilities.description: Dodai (S) uses Rubber Ball and Rope one enemy dealing 35 damage. One random teammate will be invulnerable when this skill is used. The following 4 turns Communication Telepathy will stun the target of this skill's physical and chakra skills.

abilities.name: Lava Release Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Dodai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
